name: Wipeout Dash 2
summary: Wipeout Dash 2 steps up the challenge with its brand new “swipe control” system to take on all new physics puzzles! Millions of gamers around the globe took on the challenges that the original Wipeout Dash had to offer but we ask … “Are you ready for more?” Wipeout Dash 2 has all new levels with all new challenges for you to come out swiping in all directions to see if you can be the ball … or Wipeout!
